name: multiverse
content:

a collection of different universes that are thought by some people to exist at the same time: What we think of as the universe could be just one of trillions of universes on an indescribably vast stage called the multiverse. It is possible that somewhere else in this larger structure that we call the multiverse there are people like us.
More examplesFewer examplesThe game involves a group of heroes who must prevent a great disaster that will destroy the multiverse. The multiverse is generally regarded only as one possible interpretation of quantum theory.They could even be used to travel from one universe to another; that is if multiverses really do exist, as some cosmologists believe they do.
